snippet: The first batch of candidates hoping to replace former Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. turned in candidacy petitions on Thursday to the Illinois Board of Elections.
abstract: First batch of candidates hoping to replace former Illinois Rep Jesse L Jackson Jr turn in candidacy petitions to Illinois Board of Elections; primary for April 9 special election is Feb 26.
lead_paragraph: The first batch of candidates hoping to replace former Representative Jesse L. Jackson Jr. turned in candidacy petitions on Thursday to the Illinois Board of Elections.

headline.main: Illinois: Candidates File in Race to Replace Jackson
headline.print_headline: Illinois: Candidates File In Race To Replace Jackson
